title: Question 17
prompt: (1) Once in a while, a friend may need you to listen to her troubles. (2) Lending an ear during your friend's difficult time is probably the best thing you can do for your friendship. (3) Besides, going shopping can be a stress release for many. (4) When you show genuine concern for what your friend is going through, you will develop a long-lasting friendship.
description: Choose the sentence that does <u>not</u> belong in the paragraph.
feedback: Sentence 3 does not support the topic sentence.  The topic sentence reads, “Once in a while, a friend may need you to listen to her troubles.” All of the other sentences support or give details about the topic sentence, except for sentence 3.
